main event: A sighting of an oval or cigar-shaped UFO observed in Tokmak, Kirghiz SSR, USSR on June 8, 1958.
interesting points: The UFO had a diameter of 20-30 cm and emitted a fiery glow that changed colors from bluish-white to red-yellow., The sighting lasted for one minute., There was a second report of a circular reddish-orange object observed crossing over Tokmak on May 15, 1960., Witnesses included members of the Aerial Support Wing (USAFS), who described the object as moving at high speed and high altitude., A resident, Mr. George Schoell, observed the unusual object crossing the Chui river near Tokmak and reported it to his landlord.
sighted object: oval or cigar-shaped object emitting fiery glow
witness description: Mr. George Schoell and members of the Aerial Support Wing (USAFS)
